title: Queue errors
body: Is anyone else getting the queue error where the accept/decline does NOT pop up? I am now currently waiting 15mins because it thinks that i have not responded or clicked decline too many times. I have tried restarting my client and my computer but the glitch still seems to happen.

replies.body:
It sounds like there's an issue with your client maintaining a stable connection to the PvP.net service, which is what delivers and queue invites. Since this is most often caused by local network settings, I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a next step.

Let me know if those steps resolve the issue.
